Text:
Olympic cycling coverage from BBC servers available with get_iplayer on 6th Aug 2012 at 11am GMT
458: Olympics - London 2012: BBC One: Day 5: 13.45-16.00, BBC Sport, Cycling
467: Olympics - London 2012: BBC One: Day 6: 16.00-18.00, BBC Sport, Cycling
478: Olympics - London 2012: BBC One: Day 7: 16.00-18.00, BBC Sport, Cycling
492: Olympics - London 2012: BBC Two: Day 6: 18.00-19.00, BBC Sport, Cycling
493: Olympics - London 2012: BBC Two: Day 7: 18.00-19.00, BBC Sport, Cycling
500: Olympics - London 2012: BBC Two: Day 5: 13.00-13.45, BBC Sport, Cycling
504: Olympics - London 2012: BBC One: Day 8: 17.15-18.50, BBC Sport, Cycling
Check the list of index numbers before downloading - they change.

Assuming you have a UK IP address (try ExpatShield VPN) just type:
get_iplayer --get XXX --modes flashvhigh --force
where XXX is the 3 digit index number
